website_summaries.verdict: Small, but fun for kids to collect and save the memories they create with their American Girl doll.
pros: Comes with adhesive squares to attach photos
It's a fun place for kids to record memories, real or imagined
Works great for kids that like to craft with their hands
cons: The scrapbook is sized for a doll, making it pretty small

customer_reviews.title: Cute Project for COVID 19
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old daughter didn't use the book part, only the decorations for her own journal. It kept her busy and the quality was very good.
customer_reviews.author: Eva

customer_reviews.title: American has been a favorite in our family for 31 yrs!
customer_reviews.text: My 5yo granddaughter now plays with her mother's American Girl. She enjoyed receiving this as a gift for being a really nice big sister and letting her little brother share her bunk beds with her, and turning the nursery into the guestroom; aka Nana's room.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Easy rainy day craft
customer_reviews.text: It’s tiny, so perfect for the mini poloroids. Girls loved putting it together.
customer_reviews.author: GrammaTeacher

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing gift for under $5. My nieces love to scrap book and these are so cute!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina VerHey

customer_reviews.title: Damaged packaging
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to be used as a gift to a little girl but the package came with faded pink plastic with corners damaged. Inside content was acceptable but because of the awful packaging, the whole thing looked cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Art47

customer_reviews.title: Cutest little gift .. :)
customer_reviews.text: This is adorable! I gave it to my step-daughter to use as an album for her birthday party / photo booth pics... She loved it! Lots of cute stickers come with it and the designs and extra little inserts for them to fill out are neat. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Stace

customer_reviews.title: Well received Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for 10 year old and she loved it
customer_reviews.author: B. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Seems cute and exactly as pictured. My niece was very excited bc of the American Girl brand... but I only gave it four stars because for what it is seemed overpriced. I'd buy it again though for the excitement factor for her.
customer_reviews.author: Lparks

customer_reviews.title: ... heard if she likes the gifts or not - good for young girls who enjoy working with their hands
customer_reviews.text: 4 star because I haven't heard if she likes the gifts or not - good for young girls who enjoy working with their hands.
customer_reviews.author: Maz

customer_reviews.title: but has enjoyed the activities
customer_reviews.text: Really cute gift set for a reasonable price. It does help if your child is reading/writing independently. My daughter is six and has required a lot of help with it, but has enjoyed the activities.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina B

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: These were a lot smaller than I expected. Not a lot to it. But for the girls, it will keep them busy for an hour or so.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: American Girl scrap book
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a granddaughter and she loved it. Parents provided pictures and she did the creative page work. Enjoyed every minute.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: This was a present for my niece who loves crafts and is old enough to write down things and draw how she feels and how life around her is. She was really very happy with this and uses it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Edyta Brzeczkowska

customer_reviews.title: About what I expected
customer_reviews.text: For the price, it seemed to be what I pictured. There was disappointment in the purchase unlike in some other American Girl Crafts, though as it was a gift I didn't open it. The girl it was a gift for seemed happy with it, so that always makes for a good gift.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My CASA child adored this product
customer_reviews.text: My CASA child is a writer. She loves to write. When she saw she had a new journal that she could decorate and tell her story in, she was thrilled. This was her favorite present and made better that she could use her new stickers in it. CASA children need a safe place to write their thoughts and feelings and this is her place.
customer_reviews.author: mairedubhtx

customer_reviews.title: Great birthday gift for my 9 year old
customer_reviews.text: Really cute! My 9 year old has loved putting this together. Anything that says all about me is usually a good thing to a kid.
customer_reviews.author: jenben

customer_reviews.title: tape and what to put in are pretty much the only other things you need
customer_reviews.text: Cute little kit for beginning scrap bookers to keep track of young memories. Scissors, glue, tape and what to put in are pretty much the only other things you need.
customer_reviews.author: LV

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality item for the price - purchased for school carnival prize.
customer_reviews.author: TZ

customer_reviews.title: This is well made- but very small. I should ...
customer_reviews.text: This is well made- but very small. I should have realized for the price- but it's more of a "Add on" gift than a main gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter (7) for Christmas. She loves it!

customer_reviews.title: Nice keepsake of memories
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and properrly packaged. Our grandaughter loves writing in her journal. Nice keepsake.

customer_reviews.title: Great little something to add to any American girl gift or any girls gift really.

customer_reviews.title: Gift

customer_reviews.title: It is a Christmas gift.....

customer_reviews.title: Great item.

customer_reviews.title: It is filled with good quality craft booking items
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this kit. It is filled with good quality craft booking items. She loves the American Girl dolls and this was a reward for good grades/behavior. Sure you could save $$$$ at an actual craft store, but it would not be American Girl brand! LOL

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I thought

customer_reviews.author: Bee Mac

customer_reviews.title: American Girl makes nice gifts
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a gift for my niece and according to her mom, she liked it a lot. Gifts like this make nice keepsakes, and gives the child a chance to be thinkers and creative! I would purchase this again as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Domino

customer_reviews.title: Check the size
customer_reviews.text: This was MUCH smaller than I expected. The package is about 8x10" but the book itself is only 5x6. I would not get this for a very young child or one who does not have much dexterity.

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice for my Daughter's First Scrapbook
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old loved making this memory book about herself. My daughter loves anything American Girl and she also loves to do crafts. I bought this for her birthday and she was excited to use it. It is a mini book but it is still really cute and memory book is well made and sturdy. If you know someone that loves American Girl like my daughter does then I would recommend this book. It would have been better if the book was a little bigger but, overall my daughter was able to make her own little scrapbook.

customer_reviews.title: A nice product but leaves you wanting more
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item with some other American Girl craft items (a sticker book and craft set). After reading the reviews I have to agree that all the items each left a little more to be desired. This product, however, was the best out of all three. Still, the book was very small and the cutouts are a little flimsy. All in all, she enjoyed it after opening the package and exploring all the pieces.

customer_reviews.title: Good for beginners...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my best friends daughter's 11th birthday - made her a scrapbooking kit. She (and all her friends) loved the American Girl items I put in the kit. This memory book is a littler smaller than i expected, but I think it's great for a 'beginner' scrapbook.
customer_reviews.author: Bella D

customer_reviews.title: A clever gift for a little girl.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as a gift for a friend's daughter. It's a good simple gift that provides a creative outlet for a young mind. Additionally it allows them to build a memento of their friends and classmates. I would recommend this gift for a girl that is into arts and crafts and has a creative nature to her.
customer_reviews.author: AverageJoe

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: This was cute. It entertained my 9 year old daughter for about an hour, so it was worth the low price charged.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: My 9 yr old daughter and her cousin lived this item, and it entertained them for hours while on vacation.
customer_reviews.author: L.G.D.M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves all Our Generation and American Girl products. She uses them for her crafting activities and has not had a complaint. The products received are as seen on the website and lives up to expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Carolanne Hoyte

customer_reviews.title: Cardboard memory kit
customer_reviews.text: This is not worth the money. The album is cardboard, held together by cardboard spine and has no slots to hold pictures. The colorful sheets that come with the set would have to be glued in. As my granddaughter loves American Girl doll I bought this for her. There was no American Girl doll logo, no real stickers or any other content to suggest it was AG other than the package. I plan to tear apart the memory book for parts so to speak and purchase something nicer. Really disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: kristen

customer_reviews.title: Purchased as Gift
customer_reviews.text: This item was purchased as a gift for my seven year old niece. She was very happy with the gift. She loved the stickers and gems. She has been making pages with pictures of her friends. I would recommend this memory book as a gift for a girl that is into arts and crafts. Quick delivery from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Seattle Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: CUTE!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as part of a gift for my friends 10 year old daughter....she loved it. Opened it up as soon as she could! worth the cost for a young girl!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

product_meta.title: American Girl Crafts Mini Scrapbook Journal Kit for Girls, 266pc
product_meta.description: Remember the amazing times you have with your friends by capturing them in this amazing America Girl mini memory books for friends. These books makes the perfect crafts for kids and are great for sleepovers, birthday parties and more! Includes (266) total pieces: (1) mini memory book, (10) mini papers, (1) sheet of stickers, (20) adhesive gems, (64) adhesive foam squares, and (3) sheets of punch out designs and words. Mini memory book measures 8'' W x 7'' H.
feature_bullets: Includes (266) total pieces: (1) mini memory book, (10) mini papers, (1) sheet of stickers, (20) adhesive gems, (64) adhesive foam squares, and (3) sheets of punch out designs and words.
Mini memory book measures 8'' W x 7'' H
Remember all of the joyous times you spend with your amazing friends by decorating this scrapbook kit, complete with tons of crafty flairs and accessories!
This mini memory book is the perfect activity for birthday parties, rainy days, sleepovers and much more!
Contains several design ideas to get your creativity flowing!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars228 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
